verses.verse: (A Psalm of Asaph.) O <S%H430>God,<s%> the <S%H1471>nations<s%> have <S%H935>invaded<s%> Thine <S%H5159>inheritance;<s%> They have <S%H2930>defiled<s%> Thy <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H1964>temple;<s%> They have <S%H7760>laid<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> in <S%H5856>ruins.<s%>

They have <S%H5414>given<s%> the <S%H5038>dead<s%> <S%H5038>bodies<s%> of Thy <S%H5650>servants<s%> for <S%H3978>food<s%> to the <S%H5775>birds<s%> of the <S%H8064>heavens,<s%> The <S%H1320>flesh<s%> of Thy <S%H2623>godly<s%> <S%H2623>ones<s%> to the <S%H9130>beasts<s%> of the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

They have <S%H8210>poured<s%> out their <S%H1818>blood<s%> like <S%H4325>water<s%> <S%H5439>round<s%> <S%H5439>about<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem;<s%> And <S%H369>there<s%> was <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H369>one<s%> to <S%H6912>bury<s%> them.
We <S%H1961>have<s%> <S%H1961>become<s%> a <S%H2781>reproach<s%> to our <S%H7934>neighbors,<s%> A <S%H3933>scoffing<s%> and <S%H7047>derision<s%> to those <S%H5439>around<s%> us.
<S%H4100>How<s%> <S%H5704>long,<s%> O <S%H3068>Lord<s%>? Wilt Thou be <S%H599>angry<s%> <S%H5331>forever<s%>? Will Thy <S%H7068>jealousy<s%> <S%H1197>burn<s%> <S%H3644>like<s%> <S%H784>fire<s%>?

<S%H8210>Pour<s%> out Thy <S%H2534>wrath<s%> upon the <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> do not <S%H3045>know<s%> Thee, And upon the <S%H4467>kingdoms<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> do not <S%H7121>call<s%> upon Thy <S%H8034>name.<s%>

Do not <S%H2142>remember<s%> the <S%H5771>iniquities<s%> of [our] <S%H7223>forefathers<s%> against us; Let Thy <S%H7356>compassion<s%> <S%H6923>come<s%> <S%H4118>quickly<s%> to <S%H6923>meet<s%> us; For we are <S%H1809>brought<s%> <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H1809>low.<s%>

<S%H5826>Help<s%> us, O <S%H430>God<s%> of our <S%H3468>salvation,<s%> for the <S%H9202>glory<s%> of Thy <S%H8034>name;<s%> And <S%H5337>deliver<s%> us, and <S%H3722>forgive<s%> our <S%H9128>sins,<s%> for Thy name's <S%H4616>sake.<s%>

<S%H4100>Why<s%> should the <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H346>"Where<s%> is their <S%H430>God<s%>?" Let there be <S%H3045>known<s%> among the <S%H1471>nations<s%> in our <S%H5869>sight,<s%> <S%H5360>Vengeance<s%> for the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of Thy <S%H5650>servants,<s%> which has been <S%H8210>shed.<s%>

Let the <S%H603>groaning<s%> of the <S%H615>prisoner<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> Thee; According to the <S%H1433>greatness<s%> of Thy <S%H2220>power<s%> <S%H3498>preserve<s%> <S%H1121>those<s%> <S%H1121>who<s%> are <S%H1121>doomed<s%> to <S%H8546>die.<s%>

And <S%H7725>return<s%> to our <S%H7934>neighbors<s%> <S%H7659>sevenfold<s%> into their <S%H2436>bosom<s%> The <S%H2781>reproach<s%> with <S%H834>which<s%> they have <S%H2778>reproached<s%> Thee, O <S%H136>Lord.<s%>

So we Thy <S%H5971>people<s%> and the <S%H6629>sheep<s%> of Thy <S%H4830>pasture<s%> Will <S%H3034>give<s%> <S%H3034>thanks<s%> to Thee <S%H5769>forever;<s%> To <S%H1755>all<s%> <S%H1755>generations<s%> we will <S%H5608>tell<s%> of Thy <S%H8416>praise.<s%>
